  2. Artificial intelligence 'doom calculator' is predicting people's deaths  USA TODAY
  3. New AI model can predict human lifespan, researchers say. They want to make sure it's used for good  Phys.org
  4. Using sequences of life-events to predict human lives  Nature.com
  5. AI trained on millions of life stories can predict risk of early death  New Scientist
